words.def: Empty oyster shells and other substances laid down on oyster grounds to furnish points for the attachment of the spawn of the oyster.
tannin extract derived from any of several mangrove barks of Pacific areas
The rocks, crushed shells, and other sea detritus that create an oyster bed , where oyster spawn can attach themselves.
followers of an exclusive system of religious beliefs and practices
the local time at the 0 meridian passing through Greenwich, England
